title: Andrew Tate Slammed With New Assault Lawsuit From Ex-Girlfriend Brianna Stern
shortdescription: Controversial influencer faces fresh indecent assault and battery claims.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: /images/Andrew Tate Slammed With New Assault Lawsuit From Ex-Girlfriend.webp
As Andrew and Tristan Tate fight extradition to the UK, American ex-girlfriend Brianna Stern has filed a civil suit alleging years of physical and sexual assault, coercive control, and battery.
Stern claims she was held against her will in Romania and forced into adult content production. The lawsuit seeks $10 million in damages.
